Text:
to clbmn314

Systems do not differ a lot of files. Basically, all the files are identical. You can simply create a link, rather than duplicate file. Use the -o option in CDIMAGE, or the option to "optimize" in UltraISO.

http://savepic.net/653370.jpg
Imitare, thanks for the suggestion and i will work on a new file in the next day or two.

optomized, http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6210160

any more suggestions, let me know and thx for the help

to clbmn314

No problem:) . Was happy to help.
